phrases: Hey, that lndian prince who is visiting...
I think he is a bit odd.
But serious men are so tiresome!
Eccentric guys are so much fun, and much more interesting!
First an elephant, and now an automobile...?
This is such an amusing toy!
It can move around without a horse.
An automobile is for outside use.
Anyway Hakim, were not you supposed to go home after a week?
There are many things I find interesting here in England.
All right then, let us go!
An automobile is for outside use, right?
Let us make a day of it, and go sightseeing together!
Please go and borrow this book for me.
What was his business here, I wonder?
With the way he was dressed, the neighbors will gossip.
There is no need for you to apologize.
This is against the law, someone is supposed to walk ahead of us with a red flag!
Did not you check it before you left?
No, but there is no fuel in the tank.
If you can wait here, I will send someone on with a message.
It is a bit far to send someone home...
Well then, how about a carriage?
I do not have any money with me...
Hey wait, what about the automobile?
I will come back for it.
This is such a lovely story.
It is about a woman born into a poor family...
I think I will borrow it next time!
Do not just wander off like that!
It is filled with pictures of women.
What on Earth are you looking at?
So it is one of those books.
Where did you find such a book?
This one will be on my card.
Then, please go to counter E.
Here you are, your member card.
Just because your women go around half-naked most of the time...
Well, I think this one's a bit better.
You are here to borrow a book, of course.
Were you about to go home?
Well, I will take you home, then!
Oh, wait, the automobile is not working.
Um... I have to be going now...
In a life so short and fragile as a dream...
Are you hiding something from me?
Grace invited me to a game of tennis.
So much free time on her hands...
She is always looking for something to do.
That is all my sisters ever think about.
A leisurely life makes for beautiful ladies.
And they give us pleasure in return.
Have you ever honestly loved anyone?!
Is there a way to falsely love someone?
I pity the woman who falls in love with you!
Playing so seriously against a child...
You make that child excuse whenever it suits you.
I will play a match with you, if you would like.
More than wondeful, he is a prince!
How lovely, to be a prince.
But being married to a prince would be difficult.
But he is a prince that has elephants!
Arthur, I heard that you have become a school prefect.
You sure like being in charge, do not you?
Well it is fine for you, you are inheriting the house.
But when it comes to my future...
You are better than Charlotte Cooper at Wimbledon!
Sister, you are such a gossip.
Sister, you are such a gossip.
You told everyone about my becoming a prefect.
Arthur, you must not be mean to our dear Grace.
A senior student, who is chosen to monitor and advise the younger students.
There is no need to cry...
Arthur, you were being mean to Colin, were not you?
Of course he was being mean.
Well, I am not really good enough to teach people...
But I have never played before!
Well then, If I can be of help.
Let us rest a while, Vivian!
Say, would you look at that...
When you hit the ball, bring your wrist back.
It seems he is no fool after all.
If all goes well between those two, we could have a title in the family.
It is more than the Jones family could have hoped for.
William had said that he could not play tennis well.
But you know, that prince from lndia?
William is very quiet, but he can be forceful too.
What time do you think it is?
Of course you cannot sleep, with all this commotion.
I held this party because I could not sleep.
There is something I want to tell you.
In other words, I proposed to her.
No, not that I am happy...
You love her, but you have not done anything about it yet, have you?
You love her, but you have not done anything about it yet, have you?
If you have exchanged promises, that is different.
Why do not you tell her?
I have only just met her.
Besides, I do not know how Emma feels...
And what about how you feel?
If you hesitate, I will take her from you.
That is not really much of a problem.
It will be a wonderful day for both of them.
But, he is not a bad guy.
I have known him since public school...
I have already given Prince Hakim my answer.
Sometimes, I am jealous of Hakim.
I think about how wonderful would it be,
if I could speak my mind, and put my thoughts into action.
You feel that way too, Emma?
But, I could never be like Hakim.
I like you just the way you are, Mr. Jones.
Let us get something to eat!
I have been tense all day.
I have not eaten a thing!
